name: Swampedge
description: You enter an enormous, smelly swamp. The sunlight is blocked by thick, entangled trees. Rice grows wild here. The path leads into a dark wooded area.

name: Swampwood
description: The swamp grows dark under the tree canopy. The sound of bugs and swamp creatures is disorienting.

name: Sawoka
description: A small abandoned village sits hidden among the vines. Trees sprout from the doorways of the buildings that circle a central mound, which seems to be full of coal.
